name: Hex (itch) (GeneralSturgeon)
description:
Hex - a weekend minimalistic project inspired by Brackey's "Making a Game in 10 Minutes".

Use A and D to move, K and L to switch colors.  ESC to return to menu. H to display highscore. 

Music: Deranged Connection by 7OOP3D (c) copyright 2020 Licensed under a Creative Commons Noncommercial Sampling Plus license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/7OOP3D/61316 Ft: Whitewolf.

Sound Effects: https://www.zapsplat.com.
